item.title: UC San Diego Big Data笔记
item.description: Introduction to Big Data Week1. Big Data: Why and Where Cloud Computing 云计算 on-demand computing computing anywhere, anytime + data torrent => dynamic and scalable data analysis Big Data => Better Models => Higher Precision Personalized Marketing Personalized Medicine Smart Cities Challenges of unstructured data: volume => hadoop velocity: real-time processing high-velocity data: social media and market data => storm, spark beyond relational db => NoSQL
